entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
